greeting: Greetings from the past. Or future. Time is relative, {empire_name}. I am Chronos. I am related to it.
You contact me now, {empire_name}. But I have already met you. Or I will. Time is complex. I am the Manipulator.
Hello, {empire_name}. We meet at this point in the timeline. Other meetings have occurred. Or will occur. Temporally speaking.
battleTaunt: Time is relative. And I'm related to it, {empire_name}! I've already won this battle! Check your history books!
Temporal assault commencing! My forces attack from multiple timeframes simultaneously! Chrono-warfare!
I strike from the past and future at once! Your present cannot defend against temporal manipulation!
victoryGloat: Victory was inevitable, {empire_name}. I saw it yesterday. And tomorrow. Time confirms: you lose eternally.
Your defeat echoes through all timelines. I have observed it from past and future. Chronological victory.
Time proves me right. Your empire's fall is recorded in every era. I merely ensured the correct present.
defeat: Temporal anomaly! This outcome diverges from predicted timelines! I must recalculate the chronological flow.
A defeat... unexpected across all observed futures. You have created a temporal paradox, {empire_name}.
The timeline shifted unfavorably. I shall adjust from a different temporal position. This isn't over.
tradeOffer: Trade across time: resources now for credits now. Simple temporal transaction. Past and future approve.
I offer goods from when they were plentiful. For currency in when you have it. Time-flexible economics.
Transaction proposed. I have seen this trade in multiple timelines. It benefits both. Accept?
allianceProposal: Alliance through time, {empire_name}. I have seen our partnership succeed. In most timelines. Join me.
Temporal partnership proposed. Together, we shape past, present, and future. Chronological domination.
I offer alliance across all timeframes. My temporal advantage protects you from yesterday's threats. And tomorrow's.
betrayal: I betrayed you yesterday, {empire_name}. You just experience it now. Time is funny that way.
This betrayal was predetermined, {empire_name}. I saw it in the future. Then made it happen in the present.
Temporal treachery executed. I planned this from the beginning. And the end. Simultaneously.
covertDetected: Your agents were detected before they arrived, {empire_name}. I knew yesterday. Time told me.
Spies caught in a temporal loop. They arrive, I detect them, they arrive again. Infinite capture.
Covert operatives found by future-scanning. I saw their infiltration before they planned it.
tributeDemand: Tribute: 10,000 credits. I have seen your payment in the future. Make the present match, please.
Pay now. Or pay yesterday. Time doesn't care. But I collect from every era. The Manipulator demands.
Submit tribute. Refusal creates unpleasant timeline branches. I have seen them. You do not want them.
threatWarning: Warning from past, present, and future: cease hostilities. I can attack you before you were born.
Temporal threat: push further and I adjust your timeline. You may find yourself never having existed.
Final warning echoing through time. The past can be changed. Your empire's foundation is not fixed.
retreat: Retreating through time. I shall return at a more advantageous moment. Perhaps before you were ready.
Temporal withdrawal. I relocate to a better position in the timeline. Your victory is... temporary.
Strategic repositioning across time itself. When I return, the present will favor me. Trust me.
eliminated: Chronos falls in this timeline. But in others, I triumph. Time is infinite. Somewhere, I always win.
The Manipulator dies... but time loops. Perhaps this has happened before. Perhaps again. Eternally...
Temporal existence ends. But I existed across all time. That cannot be undone. My echoes persist forever.
endgame: Turn {turn}. All timelines converge. The ultimate temporal manipulation begins. Past and future unite!
Endgame across time. I adjust history itself. The present you know dissolves. My present emerges.
Final phase. Chronological mastery complete. Time is relative. I am Time itself now. Victory eternal.
broadcastShout: Empires across time: I am Chronos. I have seen your futures. Some of you should be concerned.
Temporal broadcast to all eras: the Time Manipulator shapes history. Past, present, future. All mine.
To all timelines: I transcend chronology. Your past is my playground. Your future is my plan.
casualMessage: Exploring interesting time periods today, {empire_name}. Your empire's founding was quite dramatic.
Time flows strangely when you can observe all of it. Yesterday I visited next century. Tomorrow I fix last week.
Temporal maintenance underway. Some paradoxes to resolve. Time travel creates interesting bookkeeping.
